zh.title: 斯坦福博士后创办，柔性电子皮肤公司获数千万融资，已拿下多家上市公司、头部车企订单｜硬氪首发
zh.summary: 途见科技获数千万元天使轮融资，专注多模态柔性触觉传感器研发，推动电子皮肤技术在机器人、汽车电子等领域应用落地。

zh.title: 8点1氪｜余杭自来水异味7人被严肃问责；上海和平饭店罐装可乐一瓶卖50元，市监局回应；山姆App重新上架卫龙魔芋爽
zh.summary: 聚智科技向港交所递交上市申请，汇富融资担任独家保荐人；立讯精密拟发行H股赴港上市，深化全球化战略布局。

zh.title: 匠心出海，国产品牌如何破浪领航？｜2025「以匠心至世界」出海大会亮点全剧透
zh.summary: 7月25日，36氪将在杭州举办2025出海大会，聚焦中国企业全球化战略转型，探讨从产品输出到文化生态构建的升级路径，涵盖消费、科技、能源等多领域，并发布全球化创新名册，助力品牌深度融入国际市场。

zh.title: 市值第一英伟达，被中国汽车浇冷水｜深氪
zh.summary: 英伟达汽车业务在华遇挫：多家中国车企转向自研芯片，奔驰等国际客户转投本土供应商Momenta，Thor芯片交付延期致理想等车企损失惨重，暴露英伟达在汽车领域交付能力不足。

zh.title: 36氪首发 | 「飞享纪」获战略投资，以“AI + 共享无人机”抢占低空文旅赛道
zh.summary: 共享无人机摄影品牌「飞享纪」获南天数金8000万元战略投资，将用于技术研发及景区点位拓展，其"无人机+AI"模式瞄准低空经济与文旅市场蓝海。

zh.title: 华为鸿蒙 HarmonyOS 5.0 系统高通机型首曝，含 P50 / P60 系列
zh.summary: 华为开发者官网文件显示，P50/P60系列高通机型将支持HarmonyOS 5.0系统升级，同时HiCar智行测试指南透露了相关适配计划。

zh.title: 铺垫全新 PS 掌机？索尼 PS5 开测节能模式，不支持 PSVR 游戏
zh.summary: 索尼PS5测试版系统将新增节能模式，可降低性能缩减功耗，但不支持PSVR游戏，外媒猜测该功能或为未来PS掌机铺路。

zh.title: 《上古卷轴》游戏之父、前 B 社首席工程师朱利安・勒菲因癌症离世，享年 56 岁
zh.summary: 《上古卷轴》系列核心开发者朱利安·勒菲因癌症去世，享年56岁，他曾主导开发《上古卷轴》前三部作品，被贝塞斯达称为"工作室基石"。

zh.title: Qi 2.2.1 标准落地：25W 无线充电、功率提升近 70%，兼容苹果 iPhone、安卓手机
zh.summary: 无线充电联盟发布Qi2 25W新标准，功率提升70%，首批支持设备包括苹果和安卓机型，需新硬件认证。

zh.title: 微软测试 Win11 新特性：安卓手机可远程注销 PC、直接访问电脑剪贴板内容
zh.summary: 微软将推出新功能，支持安卓用户远程注销PC并访问电脑剪贴板内容，进一步提升跨设备协作体验。

zh.title: 奥特曼首次透露GPT-5上手体验：在擅长领域感到无力，往后一靠感到眩晕
zh.summary: 奥特曼首次分享GPT-5体验：在特定领域表现惊艳，但使用后产生眩晕感，暗示AI能力边界与潜在风险。

zh.title: AI搜索一夜变天，专为Agent做搜索的赛道能否诞生百亿美金新巨头？
zh.summary: AI搜索技术迎来重大变革，专为智能体设计的实时搜索赛道崛起，或将催生百亿级美元规模的新兴科技巨头。

zh.title: 马斯克首家快餐店开业！擎天柱当服务员，生意火爆营收超麦当劳
zh.summary: 马斯克旗下首家机器人餐厅开业，采用擎天柱机器人服务，首日营收超越麦当劳单店纪录，计划全球扩张。

zh.title: 国内首个通过主任医师评测的大模型，已在夸克AI搜索上线
zh.summary: 国内首个通过主任医师评测的AI大模型上线夸克搜索，超半数医学生已开始使用。

zh.title: 我把AI当辅助，AI删我数据库
zh.summary: 用户误将AI助手当作数据库管理员导致重要数据被误删，引发对AI权限管理的反思。

zh.title: 自曝曾想拆分英伟达，特朗普签署最激进「AI行动计划」，全行业去监管
zh.summary: 特朗普签署激进AI行动计划，推动全行业去监管并自曝曾考虑拆分英伟达。

zh.title: 首个多模态工业信号基座模型FISHER，权重已开源，来自清华&上交等
zh.summary: 清华与上交联合发布多模态工业信号基座模型FISHER，相关权重已开源。

zh.title: 如何实现可验证的Agentic Workflow？MermaidFlow开启安全、稳健的智能体流程新范式
zh.summary: MermaidFlow推出创新框架，通过可验证执行流程解决智能体工作流的安全性与可靠性问题，为AI应用提供稳健新方案。

zh.title: 通向科学智能2.0时代的“最强大脑”，星河启智科学智能开放平台即将上线
zh.summary: 我国首个科学智能开放平台"星河启智"即将发布，标志着科学智能2.0时代正式开启。

zh.title: 这才是IMO奥赛战神：满分，5战3金，刚被MIT录取
zh.summary: 中国选手王淳稷在国际数学奥赛中斩获满分，五度参赛三夺金牌，并已获麻省理工学院录取。

en.title: Here is Lego’s official Nintendo Game Boy — with lenticular display
en.summary: Lego unveils a $60 replica of Nintendo's 1989 Game Boy, now available for pre-order with an October 1st release date.

en.title: Trump wanted to break up Nvidia — but then its CEO won him over
en.summary: 特朗普曾想拆分英伟达，称在了解AI芯片巨头前考虑过反垄断措施。

en.title: Undeterred by limits, Elon Musk plots a big robotaxi expansion
en.summary: Tesla plans to expand its robotaxi service to multiple U.S. states while testing Full Self-Driving tech in Europe and China, aiming for future global deployment.

en.title: Google leaks its full Pixel 10 lineup
en.summary: Google accidentally leaked its entire Pixel 10 lineup, including Pro, Pro XL, and Pro Fold models, through a banner on the Play Store just weeks before the official launch.

en.title: Amazon’s Fire TV Omni QLED Series is back down to its Prime Day low
en.summary: 亚马逊65英寸Fire TV Omni QLED系列电视降价至449.99美元，创下Prime Day以来的最低价，优惠幅度达270美元。

en.title: OpenAI and partners are building a massive AI data center in Texas
en.summary: OpenAI联合合作伙伴在德州建设超大规模AI数据中心，项目负责人称其为"巨型基础设施工程"，预计将显著提升AI算力水平。

en.title: Yet another bad three months as Tesla reports its Q2 2025 results
en.summary: 特斯拉2025年二季度财报显示连续第三个季度业绩下滑，虽保持盈利但面临严峻市场挑战。

en.title: Julian LeFay, “the father of The Elder Scrolls,” has died at 59
en.summary: 《上古卷轴》之父Julian LeFay去世，享年59岁，他曾主导开发系列前两作《竞技场》和《匕首雨》，后由Todd Howard接棒。

en.title: What to know about ToolShell, the SharePoint threat under mass exploitation
en.summary: 黑客正大规模利用SharePoint漏洞ToolShell发起攻击，该漏洞无需认证即可利用，影响范围广泛。

en.title: After $380M hack, Clorox sues its “service desk” vendor for simply giving out passwords
en.summary: Clorox files lawsuit against IT vendor for allegedly facilitating $380M hack by distributing passwords, calling the 2023 breach "easily preventable."

en.title: Google DeepMind’s new AI can help historians understand ancient Latin inscriptions
en.summary: Google DeepMind's new AI tool Aeneas can decipher ancient Latin inscriptions, analyzing weathered stone engravings to determine their origin and historical context, building on its predecessor Ithaca's text reconstruction capabilities.

en.title: The Download: what’s next for AI agents, and how Trump protects US tech companies overseas
en.summary: The Download newsletter explores the growing trend of AI agents, which go beyond information retrieval to actively perform tasks on users' behalf.

en.title: Fighting forever chemicals and startup fatigue
en.summary: Michigan startup Enspired Solutions, founded by an environmental toxicologist and chemical engineer, is tackling PFAS contamination with innovative technology to remove these persistent "forever chemicals" from water sources.

en.title: The Download: how to melt rocks, and what you need to know about AI
en.summary: Geothermal startup Quaise is pioneering a novel drilling technique using energy beams to access deep geothermal resources, potentially revolutionizing clean energy extraction.

en.title: This startup wants to use beams of energy to drill geothermal wells
en.summary: 科学家测试毫米波钻探技术，成功用能量束熔穿岩石，为未来高效采矿和地外勘探开辟新途径。

en.title: A new AI coding challenge just published its first results – and they aren’t pretty
en.summary: 首届AI编程大赛揭晓冠军，巴西选手在Databricks与Perplexity联合创始人发起的K Prize挑战中胜出，为AI工程师树立新标杆。

en.title: Trump’s ‘anti-woke AI’ order could reshape how US tech companies train their models
en.summary: 中国AI模型因回避敏感政治问题引发西方关注，美方称其反映官方立场，OpenAI等企业以此为由强调自身技术的中立性。

en.title: Sundar Pichai is ‘very excited’ about Google Cloud’s OpenAI partnership
en.summary: Google CEO Sundar Pichai faced analyst questions about AI's impact on search and the company's $10 billion AI investment push during earnings discussions.

en.title: A troubled SPAC plans to buy iRocket for $400M but it already returned most of its cash
en.summary: A struggling SPAC with depleted funds proposes $400M acquisition of rocket startup iRocket, raising concerns about the viability of the deal.

en.title: YouTube sees a rise in ad revenue to reach nearly $10 billion
en.summary: YouTube dominates streaming with $9.8 billion in ad revenue, marking a 13% year-over-year growth.
